questions.question: Choose the correct completion: 'If you _____ your homework now, you will have time to watch TV later.'
Which sentence correctly uses the first conditional?
options: If he will get up early, he catches the train.
If he gets up early, he will catch the train.
If he getting up early, he will catch the train.
If he got up early, he catches the train.
questions.answer: If he gets up early, he will catch the train.
